extendedInfo.description: Your excuses for bad sex just ran out! Finally a high quality, all-in-one sex app for Android operating systems. Dr. SexyTime is packed full of unique sex education and entertainment features you won't find anywhere else. Your partner will thank you!**Note: Upgrade your operating system before download! You must run Android 2.2 or higher in order to enjoy this app. Contact your telephone carrier or Samsung for more help.**Dr. SexyTime offers a visual guide to sexual positions that's way sexier than the Kama Sutra (and much more practical), plus a variety of educational, interactive and easy to use utilities that are sure to improve your sex life, literally overnight. Smarter sex is better sex, and Dr. SexyTime can help you be an expert!Dr. SexyTime is the best sex app available for Android and Apple operating systems. Designed by scientists to be the most educational and helpful guide available to become a better lover. An AppCraver.com "Editor's Pick," and Thrillist.com called it the "...best app ever, by far!" A glowing CNET review concluded "Itâs like Netflix for lovemaking." Find out what all the buzz is about.Features:1. Consult the visual Sex Position Guide to see specific lovemaking positions, and get detailed insights into each, including how to make them more enjoyable and comfortable. Get the most out of sex, because no one is born an expert. To get your partner anticipating the fun, email an image of any position with the touch of a button! You can also choose from a variety of visual characters that illustrate the sex positions, including the ability to download more visual characters through the "Get More SexyTime" in-app purchase feature.2. Get countless ideas to improve your sex life provided from a variety of knowledgeable and science based resources. Who said science was boring? Doctor SexyTime designed dozens of specific Homework Assignments for you and your lover to complete, ranging from beginner to sexpert. Each assignment explains why doing it will lead to great sex and improve your relationship with your lover. WARNING: some sexual homework assignments are for advanced players only! We've included a section just for romantic ideas and to get educated on the Science of Sex. See the App User Hints section to get tips on using the best sex app available for iPhone and Android.3. Take the guesswork and embarrassment out of suggesting a new position to your partner by using the tools in the Randomizer to generate a surprise playlist. You might even learn a new favorite position. This utility includes several additional quick-launch features.4. For those who know what they want, use the Choreographer to create a customized playlist of sex positions and let the app coach you through the fun. Take turns with your partner to creating fun playlists. Donât worry, the app uses sexy verbal instructions, so itâs hand-free.5. You can also recreate Famous Movie Sex Scenes using the Saved Playlists feature, or save your own favorite sex playlist for later. Visit our Facebook page to suggest your favorite movie sex scene to be added to the app.Any way you use it, Dr. SexyTime Advanced Sex Guide will offer more ideas, more confidence, and more fun in the bedroom. Be smarter at sex, and be a happier, healthier couple.Follow us on Twitter or Like us on Facebook for daily insights into the Science of Better Sex!@DoctorSexyTimehttp://www.facebook.com/drsexytimewww.DrSexyTime.comNote: The makers of this app do NOT condone sexual activity other than between safe and consenting adults, and bear no responsibility for how this app is used. SexyTime and Dr. SexyTime are registered trademarks of Calvert Strategies, LLC.Another note: Dr. SexyTime has been banned in China â we apologize for this inconvenience. No sexy time there.** In accordance with Android guidelines, this app contains no nudity. **

reviews.title: More banging for my buck!
reviews.comment: Im obsessed with this app and it literally works better than being at a bar holding a puppy! So many features, I don\'t think anyone could be disappointed unless they hate sex. Can\'t say enough good things about this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jonah from down under
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. Would recommend it to anyone for a very easy way to spice up your sex life. Lots of grear tips to add another dimension to your sex life.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great visual, no guess app
reviews.comment: This app simplifies, and gives a straight forward approach to finding new ideas.

reviews.comment: Saw this on an iPhone, it looks even better on Android. BEST APP EVER! It\'s our new go to app on Date Night.

reviews.title: WOW.  Pays for itself quickly!
reviews.comment: There is some serious thought put into it. It is detailed without being explicit, it is adventurous without being awkward.  It worked for me and my girl....

reviews.title: Brilliant, Beautiful and Full of Features
reviews.comment: This app is absolutely fantastic. Amazing graphics!! The HW assignments are fun and the movie sex scene playlists are great. Their position guide has all sorts of useful tips. Best app of this type I\'ve seen and very easy to use.
